html:
2.27.19  2:59 pm   have you ever recorded vocals very late at night?

     yes

2.27.19  1:46 pm   I have only forged 2 things: a candle holder spike and a wall hook with a leaf nail holder. However, I can recognize the colors the hot metal is supposed to be for the different actions, e.g. for flattening and tapping and cutting and tempering etc. Would you say I a a blacksmith? Have I earned your high and good opinion? Or do I need to be a professional

     considering i just had to look up what a blacksmith is, i would assume i am not the right person to judge blacksmiths

2.27.19  12:45 pm   how do you cope with the fact that you're going through too many changes?

     try to imagine what the changes would be like 1 at a time, and then visualize them in 4 different quadrants of a piece of paper, and then imagine them merging all together

2.27.19  12:28 pm   How to get over unrequited love? Have a nice day, bill

     that's exactly right

2.27.19  12:12 pm   would you like to know when people make things inspired by your things or does that not interest you

     it's not always possible to know

2.27.19  12:11 pm   why not just upload songs without music videos with a a spinning disc or something like you did for songs such as "the road"?

     1.16.19  3:12 pm

2.27.19  11:51 am   what makes you happy?

     things changing, staying the same, and changing between changing and staying the same

2.27.19  11:38 am   do you think your live band will have backing dancers?

     no

2.27.19  10:23 am   opinions about love and relationships? 

     seems legit

2.27.19  9:13 am   referencing back to one of your old jingles, how much of your floor have you eaten already?

     none

2.27.19  8:38 am   do you have a reason as to why "got to know what's going on", "in california" and "i love you" were not uploaded to youtube

     they didn't have videos

     and do you have any plans of doing so?

     i would have to make videos for them first

2.27.19  7:56 am   Do you think there is a possibility that the universe is actually an experimental design created by some conscious being, who created it to understand how their universe was created who was created by perhaps another conscious being?

     it's you

2.27.19  6:20 am   did this question answering thing thought you anything? 

     millions of things

2.27.19  5:22 am   Why do you sometimes disappear from the questions page for days at a time?

     should never be more than 24 hours, but when i am not doing questions i am working on audio visual content

2.27.19  5:11 am   i have found that it is useful, helpful, and fun for me to analyze why i like things. it also has the benefit of spending no time disliking things. many of the things i am analyzing lately are yours, and i just wanted to ask you if you analyze them while you're making them or if you know all the things you like in advance so you don't even need to?

     the only way to know if i like something is if it gives me the special feeling. can analyze after, once i already know i like it. but analysis is not always very useful. liking stuff is very ellusive

2.27.19  4:09 am   can you tell us when the new video is coming out?

     no

2.27.19  4:08 am   what does the current schedule look like?

     freak out 7 days a week

2.27.19  1:16 am   do you ever scream super loud?

     no but perhaps i should

      if so can you show us

2.27.19  12:28 am   Do you write your thoughts down on paper

     yes but i sometimes write them down digitally

2.26.19  11:27 pm   how is it possible that the universe exists?

     i don't know

2.26.19  11:09 pm   Is you new vid planned on a not-2-week schedule, or is it on a confused 2-week schedule?

     unsuccessful 1 + 1 week schedule

2.26.19  10:57 pm   do you think you only are what you believe you are

     i don't know

2.26.19  9:59 pm   How do you make concepts for your songs?

     almost any concept i can think of is a possible concept for songs. i have a list going

2.26.19  9:58 pm   Why is the west coast on fire?

     too much glamour

2.26.19  6:31 pm   I don't know how I got here. All I know is that I want to go somewhere else. Any handy tips and/or tricks?

     motion / movement

2.26.19  6:23 pm   What's your favorite Kenny Loggins moment?

     how about this

2.26.19  6:22 pm   Why did you make a yt channel?

     pressure from society

2.26.19  5:01 pm   Wait, i can ask you questions here?

     yes

2.26.19  3:35 pm   would u like to be a tree?

     only if i can be all of them at the same time

2.26.19  2:55 pm   why is there an otherother.html but no otherotherother.html

     why are there 50 letters in your question but not 51

2.26.19  2:46 pm   Where do you get your inspiration? Personally, I like mine imported from France where I can buy it at my loc supermarket, but I get the sense you grow your own.

     i get it on the black market

2.26.19  2:45 pm   how do i convince myself to do the work if there is no point to any of it? i really don't see the point of any of this work.

     if there is no point to it then you really shouldn't be doing it

2.26.19  2:11 pm   can i ever be a dragonfly

     yes but by the time you are it won't be called that

2.26.19  12:50 pm   AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAH

     that's true

2.26.19  12:49 pm   you said you would talk about velcro, but will you really? 

     maybe

2.26.19  12:23 pm   list one (1) thing you love

     the floor

2.26.19  12:20 pm   What did you do in new canaan that one time?
Did you have fun?

     i wrote a song, or at least most of it

2.26.19  11:25 am    can I become a emoji? asking for a friend 

     sure but you need to be prepared to sometimes be a blank box if you go outside your jurisdiction

2.26.19  11:15 am   What are 3 words to describe yourself?

     dumb ass

2.26.19  11:12 am   Was "sometimes i whatever" the only time you recorded your thought process before making a video or did you do that for other videos as well?

     every time

      we dont see much of it on the reality page.

     there will be more

2.26.19  11:07 am   I recently discovered i ADORE when the rhythm of the percussion fill lines up with the rhythm of the singer's vocal flourish. It. Is. Heavenly. Do you have any suggestions for songs that accomplish this?

     you'd have to give me an example of what you're talking about

2.26.19  10:30 am   What defines a thing as "bad"?

     if someone important doesn't like it

2.26.19  9:30 am   did you actually make spelling mistakes on purpose

     occasionally

2.26.19  6:55 am   Which religion you following if any?

     religion is no fun if you call it a religion. it seems most of the time when people say 'religion' they are usually referring to how lame other people's religions are

2.26.19  4:05 am   what's your peak jokes per hour (JPH)? just wanna know what level of jokester we're dealing with here

     sometimes the quantity of jokes is not as important as their depth and breadth

2.26.19  2:29 am   you mentioned that there are services that lock you out of the internet, perhaps to help with productivity and getting the thing done. do you use these services yourself?

     no

2.26.19  1:46 am   Is 14 the last level of suffering? Cause I really don't want there to be a 15th.

     15 is like the most important level

2.26.19  1:43 am   bill, is there anything you would consider your favorite? what is it?

     ghosts

2.26.19  1:37 am   what do you want?

     how about some cool shapes

2.26.19  1:32 am   Which platform should I follow you on to get updates about the schedule and stuff?

     the questions page
